670: This attack’s type is determined by the user’s type change.
10211: Makes move gauges accelerate on the allied field of play. Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs.
10171: Reduces the user’s sync move countdown by one. If used by Mega Venusaur, reduces the user’s sync move countdown by two. (If used in a co-op battle, reduces the sync move countdown of all allied sync pairs.) Makes all allied sync pairs gradually heal themselves.
11180: Drastically raises an ally’s Attack and Sp. Atk. Ensures that the ally’s next attack will be a critical hit.
11190: Changes the user’s type to that of the target’s weakness. This changes the user’s own weakness type and the type of the user’s Multi-Attack and Audacious Multi-Attack. Drastically raises the user’s Speed.
11200: Raises the user’s evasiveness and critical-hit rate. Restores a bit of the user’s HP and charges the user’s move gauge by two in a pinch.
61600: Become Mega Blastoise until the end of battle. The more the user’s Defense has been raised, the greater the power of this move.
61700: Become Mega Venusaur until the end of battle. Its power increases if the target is poisoned or badly poisoned.
78500: This attack’s type is determined by the user’s type change.
